title: CampaignDetails
description: Schema for the CampaignDetails created and associated to each Campaign

destination_url.description: The URL that Campaign partners will redirect users to.

name.description: Name for the Campaign to be recognisable by Partners.

description.description: A description for the Campaign detailing when and how users are converted once the destination_url is reached.

image.description: A hosted image URL to further enhance recognisability of the Campaign.

external_link.description: A URL Partners can visit to receive more information about the Campaign.
